shortDescription: CareerCatalyst is a web platform ASU professors and staff developed to provide streamlined career development resources and tools for students and professionals. It offers personalized career guidance, skills-building courses, and job search support to empower users in advancing their career goals.

The 100 Million Learners program by Thunderbird School of Global Management at ASU offers free, world-class online education in 40 languages. Its mission is to empower individuals worldwide with critical business, leadership, and entrepreneurial skills, fostering global economic growth and opportunity.

Triangulator is a product developed by ASU that automates the process of determining course transfers between universities. My contributions include being one of the leading developers on the project.
Study Hall is an education platform created by the Study Hall YouTube channel and ASU. My contributions include refactoring the payment system to increase reliability.
